word_mean: 夸大狂：无根据地认为自己无比伟大、善良或能干
夸大狂的思维称为夸大妄想

sentence.Network_en: Early success may lead to megalomania.
sentence.Network_cn: 少年得志可能导致妄自尊大.

sentence.Network_en: It was probably just a wild idea of Chao Po - tao's, reinforced by American bourgeois megalomania.
sentence.Network_cn: 那多半是赵伯韬他们的幻想, 加上了美国资产阶级的夸大狂.

sentence.Network_en: If it can cure nothing else, it can cure man of megalomania.
sentence.Network_cn: 它如果不能治愈别的疾病, 至少能够治愈人类的狂妄自大的病.

GRE逆序_馆档网 ... mania 癫狂，狂热 megalomania 自大狂 pyromania 纵火狂.
gre核心词汇 - 豆丁网 ... maudlin adj 感情脆弱的 megalomania n 夸大狂妄自尊大 mendacious adj 虚假的说谎的.

entry.tran: 自大狂;夸大狂;妄自尊大
entry.def: Megalomania is the belief that you are more powerful and important than you really are. Megalomania is sometimes a mental illness.

means.word_mean: 1. a psychological state characterized by delusions of grandeur

auth_sentence.content: We pretended that his temper, megalomania and vindictiveness didn't exist.
auth_sentence.res_content: We pretended that his temper, megalomania and vindictiveness didn't exist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We pretended that his temper, megalomania and vindictiveness didn't exist.

auth_sentence.content: The man borders on megalomania, and a setback or compromise of any sort seems to be viewed as a personal attack on him.
